tokens_words_counter.py.name: tokens_words_counter.py
tokens_words_counter.py.description: Counts words and AI tokens for a given text file.
tokens_words_counter.py.help_text: Counts words and AI tokens for a given text file.

options.name: --text_file
options.description: File containing the text to count (required)

options.name: --context_window
options.description: Context window for Claude 3.7 Sonnet (default: 200000)

options.name: --betas_max_tokens
options.description: Maximum tokens for AI output (default: 128000)

options.name: --thinking_budget_tokens
options.description: Maximum tokens for AI thinking (default: 32000)

options.name: --desired_output_tokens
options.description: User desired number of tokens to generate before stopping output

options.name: --request_timeout
options.description: Maximum timeout for each *streamed chunk* of output (default: 300 seconds)

character_analyzer.py.name: character_analyzer.py
character_analyzer.py.description:
Analyzes manuscript, outline, and world files to
        identify and compare character appearances. It extracts
        a master character list that details which files each
        character appears in, examines consistency across documents,
        and highlights discrepancies in names, roles, or
        relationships. The analysis produces a detailed report with
        sections and recommendations to improve character coherence.
        This is needed because AI draft writing has a tendency to add new characters!
character_analyzer.py.help_text: Analyze characters across story files using Claude AI.

options.name: --manuscript_file
options.description: File containing the manuscript to analyze (required)

options.name: --outline_file
options.description: File containing the story outline (optional)

options.name: --world_file
options.description: File containing the story world/lore information (optional)

options.name: --context_window
options.description: Context window for Claude 3.7 Sonnet (default: 200000)

options.name: --betas_max_tokens
options.description: Maximum tokens for AI output (default: 128000)

options.name: --thinking_budget_tokens
options.description: Maximum tokens for AI thinking (default: 32000)

options.name: --desired_output_tokens
options.description: User desired number of tokens to generate before stopping output

options.name: --request_timeout
options.description: Maximum timeout for each *streamed chunk* of output (default: 300 seconds)

options.name: --save_dir
options.description: Directory to save character analysis reports (default: current directory)

options.name: --skip_thinking
options.description: Skip saving the AI thinking process (smaller output files)

options.name: --analysis_description
options.description: Optional description to include in output filenames

tense_consistency_checker.py.name: tense_consistency_checker.py
tense_consistency_checker.py.description:
Analyzes manuscript for verb tense consistency using Claude AI.
        Identifies and reports on tense shifts, inconsistencies, and patterns
        across the manuscript. Helps ensure narrative voice remains consistent
        throughout your story, especially when working with AI-generated content
        which may struggle with maintaining consistent tense.
tense_consistency_checker.py.help_text: Analyze manuscript for verb tense consistency using Claude AI.

options.name: --manuscript_file
options.description: File containing the manuscript to analyze (required)

options.name: --analysis_level
options.description: Level of tense analysis detail (default: standard)

options.name: --chapter_markers
options.description: Text that marks the start of chapters (default: 'Chapter')

options.name: --context_window
options.description: Context window for Claude 3.7 Sonnet (default: 200000)

options.name: --betas_max_tokens
options.description: Maximum tokens for AI output (default: 128000)

options.name: --thinking_budget_tokens
options.description: Maximum tokens for AI thinking (default: 32000)

options.name: --desired_output_tokens
options.description: User desired number of tokens to generate before stopping output

options.name: --request_timeout
options.description: Maximum timeout for each *streamed chunk* of output (default: 300 seconds)

options.name: --save_dir
options.description: Directory to save tense analysis reports (default: current directory)

options.name: --skip_thinking
